attributes.title: Ban Tiktok? More Like Ban This!
attributes.review:
What with all the craziness going on in our world, I downloaded this app as an escape back to simpler times. You know-- back to a kind old city in Germany in 1933. I wanted to scroll through while I groomed my moustache, and maybe even talk to good, like-minded people like me. Never have I been so disappointed, though!
The app was tricky to navigate and hard to use! When it texted me a verification code, I texted it back and asked it what Trump thought of all those nasty women and libtards who want to destroy our history, and it didnâ€™t respond! Iâ€™m starting to worry that Trump doesnâ€™t have a plan for us after all. :(
Whoever is texting me from the app shows no emotion whatsoever. Iâ€™m starting to think that they might be a sociopath like the FÃ¼hrer-- I mean Trump. Anyways, Iâ€™m throwing away my red armband-- my bad, hat-- and buying a Biden shirt instead. Sleepy Joe can take my vote! At least he cares, unlike Trump.
If you want to serve the fatherland, donâ€™t download this app; vote Biden 2020!
Sincerely,
Anne T. Faa (Itâ€™s my grandmotherâ€™s name, donâ€™t laugh! We built this country after taking it from the uncivilized savages! I'm not privileged, though-- I've had a very hard life. Somebody called me a boomer one time.)
PS-- the app tried to offer me a complimentary MAGA hat. â€œMAGAâ€ is such a stupid slogan; why would I want a hat that says â€œwitchâ€ when translated into Latin? I donâ€™t think we should indoctrinate the children and make them think that unholy, dark magic is okay! Weâ€™re not all witches; Betsy Devoss doesnâ€™t speak for all of us.
